meanings.sent1: The plastic bags were unrecyclable and had to be thrown away.
meanings.sent2: The unrecyclable materials ended up in the landfill.
meanings.sent3: The unrecyclable items in the bin made the recycling process difficult.
meanings.sent4: Her unrecyclable attitude towards conservation shocked her friends.
meanings.sent5: The unrecyclable waste polluted the environment.

meanings.definition: Unable to be processed for reuse.
meanings.sent1: The broken glass was unrecyclable and had to be disposed of carefully.
meanings.sent2: The unrecyclable electronics were piling up in the storage room.
meanings.sent3: His unrecyclable jokes always made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The unrecyclable thoughts cluttered his mind.
meanings.sent5: The unrecyclable containers cluttered the kitchen counter.
